name: Frog Jump (StevenJClarke)
description:
Frog Jump is a short Tactical Jumping Platformer heavily inspire by Jump King.

Jump your way to the top of the level to find the Crown and become human again.

Features:

- Charge Jumping

-Tongue Grapple

- Wall Bouncing

-Fall Penalty

-Falling Multiple Times

-Blinding Red Background
